events.name: The Makers' Party
events.description:
Calling all makers from the region. The Makers' Party is an exclusive event dedicated towards creating more opportunties between both local and international makers to create a more vibrant ecosystem, empower yet enabling collaborations for growth and continues to celebrate the spirit of sharing.

We will be having potluck dinner party. Lets bring some food or drinks along to share! Haha. For visitors from other countries, feel free to explore Singapore and bring food that originated from your country. Your kindness is much appreciated!

The party will be held in Prototyping Lab @ National Design Centre.

See you there!
events.location: Prototyping Lab, 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre, Singapore 188969
